heart.name: Heart
heart.description: Core vitality hub for the HeadyLens demo body.
heart.logic: Receipts and authorization pulses route through the heart node before any critical action.
heart.ip: RAA Execution Fabric (Patent #14 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.) and PQC Evidence Chain (Patent #15 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

brain.name: Brain
brain.description: Decision center that interprets signals and governs risk.
brain.logic: Socratic validation and deterministic risk scoring gate high-impact tools.
brain.ip: HeadyReflect (Patent #29 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.) and HeadyGuard safety limits (Patent #21 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

left_arm.name: Left Arm
left_arm.logic: Physical key custody ensures actions are initiated only by the holder.
left_arm.ip: PTACA key custody (Patent #1 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

right_arm.name: Right Arm
right_arm.description: Secondary execution channel for safe operations.
right_arm.logic: Execution routes honor policy supply chain controls before action.
right_arm.ip: Policy Supply Chain (Patent #17 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

lungs.name: Lungs
lungs.description: Breathing layer that keeps the system resilient under load.
lungs.logic: Tunnel-only origin policies ensure clean ingress and safe flow control.
lungs.ip: Tunnel-Only Origin (Patent #16 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

eyes.name: Eyes
eyes.description: Observation layer that reads system state without exposing raw telemetry.
eyes.logic: Data is processed ephemerally and summarized before exposure.
eyes.ip: Ephemeral memory processing (Patent #19 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

heady_make.name: HeadyMake
heady_make.description: Proof-of-Structure layer for additive manufacturing integrity.
heady_make.logic: Each printed layer is scanned, hashed, and signed to attest internal structure fidelity.

heady_field.name: HeadyField
heady_field.description: Regenerative Oracle that ties soil telemetry to reward flows.
heady_field.logic: Sensor readings are validated, scored, and routed to smart-contract payouts.
heady_field.ip: Regenerative Oracle (Patent #36 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).

heady_legacy.name: HeadyLegacy
heady_legacy.description: Sovereign Succession protocol for secure key inheritance.
heady_legacy.logic: Biometric inactivity triggers shard reconstruction and controlled transfer.
heady_legacy.ip: Sovereign Succession (Patent #37 — assigned to HeadySystems Inc.).
